_sText:
---deathrun_city-assault_b1fix ---
Map Created By: m0tty
FPSBanana Link: http://www.fpsbanana.com/members/496920

I wanted to create another deathrun map, similar to a city. After scrapping 3 15% completed maps, I decided to create this map, based in a city. After 2 weeks of work, I finally present to you, a playable beta of this map. The 3dSkybox took me some time to get near perfection, and its still pretty far away from it. There are 25 traps (23 controlled traps, 2 uncontrolled) and the traps are listed here:

C = Controlled Trap
U= Uncontrolled Trap
__________________________________________
1.Spikes of death - Spikes rise up from the floor and kill you!  -C-
2. Drunk Driver! - A van will drive up on yo' ass. :D -C-
3.Fire Hydrants - Don't get wet! (That's what she said XD) -C-
4.Lamp Posts - Can and WILL crush you! -C-
5. Silly C4 - Blows up! -C-
6. Correct platform - Choose the correct platform-C-
7. Barrels Of Doom! - This trap will be usable after the 7th trap is activated. -C-
8. Air Conditioners - Spray out nasty smoke, Gross! -C-
9. Floor Of DEWM - If your on it when it turns red, YOUR DEAD >:( -C-
10. Spears - Shoot out at you and stab you. -C-
11. Sparks - Those damn electricians better fix that problem! -C-
12. Boxes - Are heavy! -C-
13. Wall Of Spikes - A wall flies into you and has spikes on it! -C-
14. Explosive Barrel Hole - If your on the platform when it breaks... -C-
15. Reversed Fan - With spikes! -C-
16. 25% Insta-Kill Lasers! - Will kill you if you walk into them! -U-
17. Boulder - Are people really keeping that as a pet? -C-
18. Floor Pull Away - Pulls the floor away! -C-
19. NO U - Blocks your jump! -C-
20. Floor Pull Away - Pulls the floor away!-C-
21. Boulder Barrage - A BARRAGE OF BARRELS HOLY SH-- -C-
22. Silly C4 - Blows you up!
23. Floor Break! - Breaks underneath you! -U-
24. Drowner 3000 - If your on the platform when it turns red, you will DROWN -C-
25. Drunk Drivers 2 - Watch out! They could catch you off guard! -C-


There are 5 secret grenades (4 for CT and 1 for T)

There are 10 endings AS OF NOW.

1.Old
2.Knife
3.Climb
4.Easy
5.Long-Jump
6.Scout
7.Mini Obstacle Course
8.Bhop
9.Nade Battle
10.???
